Kount\Ris

Class Kount_Ris_ArraySettings

All Implemented Interfaces:

Kount_Ris_Settings
public class Kount_Ris_ArraySettings
implements Kount_Ris_Settings

Configuration information for RIS requests.

Expects to be constructed with a PHP array having the following keys:
- MERCHANT_ID: Kount Mechant Id - URL: RIS server URL - PEM_CERTIFICATE: Path to PEM encoded x509 public certificate - PEM_KEY_FILE: Path to PEM encoded x509 private key - PEM_PASS_PHRASE: Passphrase to decrypt x509 private key

Package: Kount
Subpackage: Ris
Author: Kount <custserv@kount.com>
Version: SVN: $Id: ArraySettings.php 19026 2012-03-29 22:37:30Z mmn $
Copyright: 2012 Kount, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
